short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The mission is to give consumer transparency about the Country of Origin of products on Amazon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the origin of your Amazon products in a snap with Americazon.shop! This straightforward Chrome browser extension unveils the Country of Origin for all products listed on Amazon, giving you the insight you need right in the search results.

Whether you're striving to support local businesses, prefer items made from a specific part of the world, or just curious to know more about your products, Americazon.shop makes the process easy and efficient.

Key features:

Real-time Origin Information: See the Country of Origin for each product on Amazon, presented directly in the search results.

Simple & User-friendly Interface: No complicated setups or cluttered UI; just install the extension and get going!

Precision and Accuracy: We constantly update our database to provide you the most accurate information.

Fast and Light-weight: Designed to operate seamlessly without slowing down your browsing experience.

Choose transparency and convenience with Americazon.shop, and add a new dimension to your online shopping experience!
